title: Task 0.6: Palette Resolution
description: Wave 4 (after 0.5). Resolve palette references for sprites in src/registry.rs: PaletteRegistry{palettes: HashMap}, register(palette), resolve(sprite)->Result<ResolvedPalette, Warning>. Inline palettes pass through. Missing references -> Warning + magenta fallback (lenient) or Error (strict). Verification: cargo test registry. Test fixtures: tests/fixtures/valid/named_palette.jsonl, invalid/unknown_palette_ref.jsonl. Reference: docs/spec/format.md - Palette Reference Options.

title: Task 0.9: CLI Implementation
description: Wave 7 (after 0.8). Implement pxl CLI in src/cli.rs with clap: Cli{command: Commands}, Commands::Render{input, output, sprite, strict}. Wire up: parse -> resolve -> render -> save. Warnings to stderr, exit codes per spec. Verification: cargo build --release, test render with examples/coin.jsonl, test -o flag, test warning output, test --strict mode. Updates demo.sh. Reference: docs/spec/format.md - Output Behavior, Exit Codes.

title: Task 0.2: Data Models
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Wave 2 (parallel with 0.3, 0.4). Define Rust structs for TTP objects in src/models.rs: Palette{name, colors}, Sprite{name, size, palette, grid}, PaletteRef{Named|Inline}, TtpObject{Palette|Sprite}, Warning{message, line}. All structs derive Serialize, Deserialize, Debug, Clone. Verification: cargo test models (JSON round-trip, fixture deserialization). Test fixtures: tests/fixtures/valid/minimal_dot.jsonl, named_palette.jsonl. Reference: docs/spec/format.md - Object Types section.
close_reason: Implemented data models: Palette, Sprite, PaletteRef, TtpObject, Warning. All tests pass (8/8). cargo build and clippy clean.

Verification: cargo build, cargo test (0 tests OK), cargo clippy (no errors). Updates demo.sh with 'Phase 0 in progress'. Reference: docs/plan/phase-0-mvp.md
close_reason: Completed project scaffolding: Cargo.toml with deps, main.rs, lib.rs with module declarations, all 8 module stubs. Verified: cargo build, cargo test (0 tests), cargo clippy (no errors). demo.sh updated.

title: Task 0.7: Sprite Renderer
description: Wave 5 (convergence - needs 0.3, 0.4, 0.6). Render sprite to image buffer in src/renderer.rs: render_sprite(sprite, palette) -> (RgbaImage, Vec<Warning>). Use image::RgbaImage, unknown tokens -> magenta #FF00FF, size inference when omitted, row padding/truncation. Verification: cargo test renderer. Test fixtures: tests/fixtures/valid/minimal_dot.jsonl, simple_heart.jsonl, lenient/row_too_short.jsonl, unknown_token.jsonl. Reference: docs/spec/format.md - Size Inference, Error Handling.

title: Task 0.5: JSONL Parser
description: Wave 3 (after 0.2). Parse JSONL stream into TTP objects in src/parser.rs: parse_line(line)->Result<TtpObject, ParseError>, parse_stream<R: BufRead>(reader)->ParseResult{objects, warnings}. Skip blank lines, collect warnings in lenient mode. Verification: cargo test parser (all valid/* parse, all invalid/* error, blank lines skipped). Test fixtures: tests/fixtures/valid/*, invalid/*. Reference: docs/spec/format.md - Stream Processing section.

title: Phase 0: MVP (Core) - Parse TTP JSONL and render sprites to PNG
Task 0.8: PNG Output
description: Wave 6 (after 0.7). Save rendered images to PNG files in src/output.rs: save_png(image, path)->Result<(), OutputError>, generate_output_path(input, sprite_name, output_arg)->PathBuf. Default naming: {input_stem}_{sprite_name}.png. Handle -o file.png vs -o directory/. Verification: cargo test output (test path generation). Reference: docs/spec/format.md - Output Behavior.

title: Task 0.10: Integration Tests & Demo
description: Wave 8 (final). End-to-end tests and demo script in tests/integration_tests.rs: test_valid_fixtures_render, test_invalid_fixtures_error, test_lenient_fixtures_warn, test_strict_mode_fails_on_warnings. Final demo.sh showing Phase 0 features. Verification: cargo test --test integration_tests, ./demo.sh runs successfully. Reference: docs/plan/phase-0-mvp.md - Verification Summary.

title: Task 0.3: Color Parsing
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Wave 2 (parallel with 0.2, 0.4). Parse hex color strings to RGBA in src/color.rs: parse_color(s) -> Result<Rgba<u8>, ColorError>. Supports #RGB, #RGBA, #RRGGBB, #RRGGBBAA formats. Verification: cargo test color (#F00->red, #FF0000->red, #FF000080->red with alpha, invalid->ColorError). Test fixture: tests/fixtures/valid/color_formats.jsonl. Reference: docs/spec/format.md - Color Formats section.
close_reason: Implemented parse_color for #RGB, #RGBA, #RRGGBB, #RRGGBBAA formats with ColorError type. All 10 unit tests pass, clippy clean.
